ExpSyntax.val: MlsTrans('Date To must less than or equal Posting Date')

SQL_STMT_U.val: select DocEntry,ObjType,DocDate,CardName, ABS(DocTotal - isnull(PaidSum, 0)) AS DocTotal,ABS(DocTotalFC - isnull(PaidSum, 0)) AS DocTotalFC,Comments,DocDueDate,NumAtCard,CardCode,DocCur,U_IDU_kode_PT from OPCH (nolock) where (docdate between :6 and ':7') and docdate<=':4' and (cardcode= ':1' or ':1' is null or ':1' ='') AND docstatus = 'O' and CANCELED = 'N' and (DocCur=':2' or ':2' is null or ':2' ='') and (U_IDU_kode_PT=':3' or ':3' is null or ':3' ='') and (DocTotal - PaidToDate) < 0 and CardName like :8 :5 union select DocEntry,ObjType,DocDate,CardName,(DocTotal - isnull(PaidSum, 0)) AS DocTotal, (DocTotalFC - isnull(PaidSum, 0)) AS DocTotalFC,Comments,DocDueDate,NumAtCard,CardCode,DocCur,U_IDU_kode_PT from ORPC (nolock) where (docdate between :6 and ':7') and docdate<=':4' and (cardcode= ':1' or ':1' is null or ':1' ='') AND docstatus = 'O' and CANCELED = 'N' and (DocCur=':2' or ':2' is null or ':2' ='') and (U_IDU_kode_PT=':3' or ':3' is null or ':3' ='') and (DocTotal - PaidToDate) > 0 and CardName like :8 :5

ExpSyntax.val: IF(Trim({0,76}) <> '' AND NOT ISNULL({0,76}), ASCIIChr(39)&'%'& Trim({0,76})&'%'&ASCIIChr(39), 'cardname')

SQL_STMT_U.val: select DocEntry,ObjType,DocDate,CardName, ABS(DocTotal - isnull(PaidSum, 0)) AS DocTotal,ABS(DocTotalFC - isnull(PaidSum, 0)) AS DocTotalFC,Comments,DocDueDate,NumAtCard,CardCode,DocCur from OPCH where (docdate between :6 and ':7') and docdate<=':4' and (cardcode= ':1' or ':1' is null or ':1' ='') AND docstatus = 'O' and CANCELED = 'N' and (DocCur=':2' or ':2' is null or ':2' ='') and (U_IDU_kode_PT=':3' or ':3' is null or ':3' ='') and (DocTotal - PaidToDate) < 0 and CardName like :8 :5 union select DocEntry,ObjType,DocDate,CardName,(DocTotal - isnull(PaidSum, 0)) AS DocTotal, (DocTotalFC - isnull(PaidSum, 0)) AS DocTotalFC,Comments,DocDueDate,NumAtCard,CardCode,DocCur from ORPC where (docdate between :6 and ':7') and docdate<=':4' and (cardcode= ':1' or ':1' is null or ':1' ='') AND docstatus = 'O' and CANCELED = 'N' and (DocCur=':2' or ':2' is null or ':2' ='') and (U_IDU_kode_PT=':3' or ':3' is null or ':3' ='') and (DocTotal - PaidToDate) > 0 and CardName like :8 :5

select DocEntry,ObjType,DocDate,CardName, ABS(DocTotal - isnull(PaidSum, 0)) AS DocTotal,ABS(DocTotalFC - isnull(PaidSum, 0)) AS DocTotalFC,Comments,DocDueDate,NumAtCard,CardCode,DocCur from OPCH (nolock) where (docdate between :6 and ':7') and docdate<=':4' and (cardcode= ':1' or ':1' is null or ':1' ='') AND docstatus = 'O' and CANCELED = 'N' and (DocCur=':2' or ':2' is null or ':2' ='') and (U_IDU_kode_PT=':3' or ':3' is null or ':3' ='') and (DocTotal - PaidToDate) < 0 and CardName like :8 :5 union select DocEntry,ObjType,DocDate,CardName,(DocTotal - isnull(PaidSum, 0)) AS DocTotal, (DocTotalFC - isnull(PaidSum, 0)) AS DocTotalFC,Comments,DocDueDate,NumAtCard,CardCode,DocCur from ORPC (nolock) where (docdate between :6 and ':7') and docdate<=':4' and (cardcode= ':1' or ':1' is null or ':1' ='') AND docstatus = 'O' and CANCELED = 'N' and (DocCur=':2' or ':2' is null or ':2' ='') and (U_IDU_kode_PT=':3' or ':3' is null or ':3' ='') and (DocTotal - PaidToDate) > 0 and CardName like :8 :5
